CustomField.description: The payment reference for this Gift Transaction.
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( fdff__Custom_Payment_Reference__c ) ) , fdff__Custom_Payment_Reference__c , IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( fdff__Recurring_Payment_Reference__c ) ) , fdff__Recurring_Payment_Reference__c , fdff__Generated_Payment_Reference__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The payment reference for this Gift Transaction.
CustomField.label: Final Payment Reference
